#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define INF 999999999
using namespace std;
 
int min(int a,int b)
{
	return a<b?a:b;
}
 
int max(int a,int b)
{
	return a>b?a:b;
}
 
 
int josephus(int n,int k,int m)
{
	if(n<=1)
	return 1;
	
	return (josephus(n-1,k,m+1)+k*m-1)%n+1;
}
 
 
int main()
{
	long long int test;
	scanf("%lld",&test);
	while(test--)
    {	
    	int n,k;  // sum : it is the required sum
    	scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
    		
    	
    	printf("%d\n",josephus(n,k,1));
    	
	}
	return 0;
}
